title: Gift a lifetime of 10TB of cloud storage for under $100
content:
Macworld

We all know someone who’s hard to shop for. And in those cases, socks or a novelty mug just aren’t going to cut it. Want to get them something that’s both creative and practical? Then try a digital gift instead, like a lifetime of Degoo Premium’s 10TB of ultra-secure cloud storage, offered for only $99.99 (reg. $1080) through Christmas Day.

Degoo Premium is a top-rated, AI-assisted cloud backup that safely stores all your files (up to 10TB worth!) across all your devices. Simply upload your photos, videos, documents, and other media, and you can access them whenever you want. Another bonus? All your media is protected using 256-bit AES encryption at rest and in transit.

Easy file sharing is also available, as Degoo offers sharing options via email, link, or users’ favorite messaging app. In addition, there’s AI that helps users rediscover old memories, a fun feature for almost any user. And, of course, this cloud subscription will have automatic updates for life.

Gift an easy and practical last-minute holiday gift when you get Degoo Premium’s 10TB of cloud storage for life for just $99.99 through December 25 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon is needed to score this exclusive price!
